Deploying and Verifying the DepositLocker: 
1. source .env && forge script ./script/DeployDepositLocker.s.sol --rpc-url=$SEPOLIA_RPC_URL --broadcast --etherscan-api-key=$ETHERSCAN_API_KEY --verify 
2. forge verify-contract \
  0x1800217427226Ce6846257fBdf8b817C5faf14DA \
  DepositExecutor \
  --chain sepolia \
  --num-of-optimizations 0 \
  --compiler-version "v0.8.27+commit.40a35a09" \
  --constructor-args "" \
  --watch \
  --via-ir

Deploying and Verifying the DepositExecutor: 
1. source .env && npx catapulta script ./script/DeployDepositExecutor.s.sol --rpc-url=$CARTIO_RPC_URL --broadcast 
2. forge verify-contract \
  0xEfa8E22c86323254D49d3DaF6D00d319846ff8Ab \
  DepositExecutor \
  --verifier-url "https://api.routescan.io/v2/network/testnet/evm/80000/etherscan" \
  --etherscan-api-key "verifyContract" \
  --num-of-optimizations 5000 \
  --compiler-version "v0.8.27+commit.40a35a09" \
  --constructor-args "" \
  --watch \
  --via-ir
